document_data.name: Djir Garpeth
document_data.mainbody: ir had slate-gray skin, no beard, and a bald head.
document_data.Description: Djir had slate-gray skin, no beard, and a bald head.
document_data.History: During the [[Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar]], Djir placed himself in a shallow cavern near [[Eveningstar]] that the [[Purple Dragons]] had recently captured from the [[drow]]. He saw the opportunity in all the heavily-armed soldiers and [[adventurer]]s running about, and set about recruiting them to come fight in the nearby [[Underdark Arena]].
